#include <iostream>
int main() { int a, b; std::cin >> a >> b; std::cout << a + b; return 0; }

factorial.code:
fn factorial(n: u32) -> u32 { if n == 0 { 1 } else { n * factorial(n - 1) } }
fn main() { let mut input = String::new(); std::io::stdin().read_line(&mut input).expect("Failed to read line"); let num: u32 = input.trim().parse().expect("Please type a number!"); println!("{}", factorial(num)); }
